TECHNIQUE.name: MOTD and pre-login banner
TECHNIQUE.DESCRIPTION: This technique will check if the required Message Of The Day is present on the system.

INPUT.NAME: MOTD
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Message of the day (MOTD) to display

SELECT1.NAME: MOTD_LOCATION
SELECT1.DESCRIPTION: Where should this text be added in the MOTD
SELECT1.LONGDESCRIPTION: This option defines if the content specified before should be appended or prepended to the file. It is irrelevant if you enforce the file content (option below), or on Windows

SELECT1.NAME: MOTD_EMPTY
SELECT1.LONGDESCRIPTION: This option will remove any existing messages in the motd file and replace them with the text provided above. On Windows, the provided text will always remove any existing message

SELECT1.NAME: MOTD_BANNER
SELECT1.DESCRIPTION: Display also this message before login
SELECT1.LONGDESCRIPTION: If this option is set, the text will also be printed before the login prompt (by editing /etc/issue and /etc/issue.net). Not available on Windows.
